props.absolute: Applies position: absolute to the component
props.active: Reduce the height to 0, hiding component
props.bgOpacity: Background opacity, if null it defaults to 0.3 if background color is not specified or 1 otherwise
props.bottom: Aligns the component towards the bottom
props.bufferValue: The percentage value for the buffer
props.indeterminate: Constantly animates, use when loading progress is unknown.
props.reverse: Displays reversed progress (right to left in LTR mode and left to right in RTL)
props.stream: An alternative style for portraying loading that works in tandem with **buffer-value**
props.striped: Adds a stripe background to the filled portion of the progress component
props.top: Aligns the content towards the top
props.clickable: Clicking on the progress track will automatically set the value
props.max: Sets the maximum value the progress can reach
props.roundedBar: Applies a border radius to the progress bar

slots.default: Provides the current value of the component
